title: Pathways to perfection;: Discourses of Thomas S. Monson
description: Pathways to Perfection presents thirty-four memorable sermons focusing on faith, service, love, and prayer given by Thomas S. Monson since his call in 1963 to the Council of the Twelve Apostles. There are helpful guidelines for leaders and teachers in the Church, for parents, for young people, for missionaries, and for those who bear testimony. Each chapter is illustrated with examples from real life, from the scriptures, and from the observations of President Monson.
author: Thomas S. Monson
